


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isPhone -->

# ```js isPhone ```


Detect if is a phone device

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isPhone from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/phone'
if (isPhone()) {
  // do something cool...
}
```
